about_the_game:
All the pictures are work in progress. I am updating the graphics as I go along with development. So what you see above is not the final graphics.

Tozerath in Ruins is a Top-Down RPG with Turn-Based combat. This Is also a Passion Project so please don't expect anything amazing or spectacular with art style or any fancy shading as I am still learning everything.

The lands of Tozerath lie in ruins waiting to be restored from the clutches of darkness and corruption. It is up to you, to bring peace back to the land and bring an end to the evil, which took it over.
Journey across the land of Tozerath and defeat the evil, one area at a time. Explore dungeons, fight in boss battles, collect armour, meet new allies for your group and restore peace to Tozerath.
